Book Now

About us

Book a ride now

Scroll to learn more

Our heart is in Orlando

Family Owned & Operated

We are a family owned & operated business centered in Orlando, Florida. This company was founded in 2013 by Beatriz Murillo and Juan Lopez, with the core goal of providing first class black car services around the Orlando and Tampa Bay areas. We have since then grew and now offer long distance rides throughout the state of Florida.

Always Professional. Always Friendly.

We are always professional and always courteous. When travelling with us, you will always be greeted with a smile and be treated with the utmost respect. We take pride in what we do and love meeting new people. The first thing you will see when our driver arrives is a smile on their face, because it truly is our pleasure to serve you.

We believe in Quality Service

Going the extra mile.

We believe in going the extra mile for you. When you ride with us, you can expect only the highest caliber of service. We make sure that we arrive to your pick up point early and get you to your destination in a timely manner so you never have to wait a minute.

Quality means driving safely so that you have the ultimate peace of mind and can relax knowing that you are in good hands. We also have child seats to accomodate your young ones and keep them safe.

We also take the time to clean our vehicles both before and after every ride so that you can travel in a clean and sanitary enviornment. This is more important than ever due to COVID-19, so you can relax knowing that we are doing our part.

“

Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.

- Henry Ford

Check out our fleet

Take a look at our fleet of vehicles and see which of our vehicles will best accomodate your needs.

Check it out

Book A Ride With Us

Ready to book a ride for your next trip to Orlando? You can book your ride online using our online booking system. You will be able to complete the entire booking process online so that when it’s time for your ride its effortless.
